Frequently Asked Questions

How old is David Robertson?

David Robertson is 40 years old.

When was David Robertson born?

David Robertson was born on April 9, 1985.

Where was David Robertson born?

David Robertson was born in Birmingham, AL.

How tall is David Robertson?

David Robertson is 5-11 (180 cm) tall.

How much did David Robertson weigh when playing?

David Robertson weighed 195 lbs (88 kg) when playing.

How many seasons did David Robertson play?

David Robertson played 16 seasons.

Is David Robertson in the Hall of Fame?

David Robertson has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.

When was David Robertson drafted?

David Robertson was drafted by the New York Yankees in the 17th round of the 2006 MLB June Amateur Draft from University of Alabama (Tuscaloosa, AL).

What position did David Robertson play?

David Robertson was a Pitcher.

How many strikeouts did David Robertson have?

David Robertson had 1,154 strikeouts over his career.

How many teams has David Robertson played for?

David Robertson played for 8 teams; the New York Yankees, Chicago White Sox, Philadelphia Phillies, Tampa Bay Rays, Chicago Cubs, Miami Marlins, New York Mets and Texas Rangers.

How many World Series has David Robertson won?

David Robertson has won 1 World Series.

When did David Robertson retire?

David Robertson last played in 2024.

What is David Robertson's Twitter account?

David Robertson is on Twitter at DRob30.

What are David Robertson's nicknames?

Houdini, D-Rob are nicknames for David Robertson.
